code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles/Waitlist.css';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faUser,faEnvelope}from'@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons';import TextField from'../components/TextField';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Waitlist=/*#__PURE__*/React.forwardRef((props,ref)=>{const[name,setName]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[isSubmitting,setIsSubmitting]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=async()=>{if(!name||!email){alert('Please enter both name and email.');return;}setIsSubmitting(true);const scriptURL='https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbwJEOhFDOiqmVsWRnzMfPe4MOV86aEMGxZnrQ-jTFLETF2gf95gge4MyXC0OueBgzA/exec';const formData=new FormData();formData.append('name',name);formData.append('email',email);try{const response=await fetch(scriptURL,{method:'POST',body:formData});if(!response.ok){throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status}`);}const result=await response.json();console.log(result);if(result.result==='success'){alert('Thanks for joining our waitlist!');setName('');setEmail('');}else{throw new Error(result.message||'Unknown error occurred');}}catch(error){console.error('Error:',error);alert('An error occurred. Please try again later.');}finally{setIsSubmitting(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"Waitlist",ref:ref,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"waitlist-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"waitlist-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Together, let's get people chatting again."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Join the waitlist to get early access and bring conversations back into daily life."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"waitlist-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faUser}),placeholder:"Name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faEnvelope}),placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmit,disabled:isSubmitting,children:isSubmitting?'Joining...':"Join the waitlist"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"@2024 Convo | All rights reserved"})]})});});export default Waitlist;
